desc.p: This is the unique ID to identify the records created under this file. This field can have any alphanumeric characters.The ID of the SEAT.DAS.COMPONENT application will be in the following format, 'APPLICATION NAME.SEQUENCE NO'
This field says ‘Error’ if there is a mismatch between TEST.WITHOUT.DAS & TEST.WITH.DAS otherwise ‘Success’.
This field gets defaulted with the query names in the DAS routines. It takes the query names from the I_DAS.Appn. routine. Example: dasFundsTransferAZ
This is a user input field, here user has to input the current Company mnemonic. Example: BNK,CO3
This field is reserved for future use.
This field check if all the queries match otherwise says ERROR.
It's a sub-value field. This field gets defaulted based on the sorts in DAS routine.Example: BY @ID

It’s a Sub-value set field which gets defaulted with the Joins involved for the particular Query in the OPTION field which has joins involved. This field has been made an Input field giving user an option of changing value if required. Example: AND,OR

This field has to be input by the user. This takes the value which has to be passed to the DAS routine when it is called. Here the values should involve only values that THE.ARGS should hold in the DAS routine ie. Any hard coded values in the DAS routine DATA field should not be included with the values passed. Example: TODAY
This field gets defaulted from the DAS routine.It holds the field involved in the query. Example: STATUS,PROCESSING.DATE (Fields of FT)

It’s a Sub-value set field which gets defaulted with the Operands involved for the particular Query in the OPTION field. This field has been made an Input field giving user an option of changing value if required.

This field has to be input by the user. This takes the value using which we form the query based on the values & get the result. The user has to see the DAS routine & give same values along with hard coded values (IF ANY) in the Data field of the DAS routine. Example: AZ-...
This field gets populated once the query formed is executed based on the field values entered in the application. No. of records selected by the query formed is updated in this field.
DAS routine is called which forms the query & gives us the result ie. Number of records selected is updated in this field.
